name: documentarist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who makes documentaries (= films or television or radio programmes that give facts and information about a subject) or who takes photographs that record events: This feature by a respected young documentarist never reached our television screens. She will be remembered as a documentarist of war and conflict. Related word
document
More examplesFewer examplesShe's becoming an intelligent documentarist, and has an instinctive grasp of film technique.He was a documentarist, taking pictures of people's wishes and dreams.The pioneering documentarist was hired to make a film in Africa.The documentarist follows the couple to South America.An exhibition of his photographs celebrates his achievements as a documentarist.
